text: Edward Flak (13 May 1948 - 11 November 2020) was a Polish lawyer and politician. He was born in Wrocław, Poland. He was Mayor of Olesno from 1990 to 1994 and again from 1998 to 2006. He was also a member of the Sejm from 1992 to 1993. Flak was a member of the German Minority Electoral Committee. Flak died on 11 November 2020 in Warsaw at the age of 72.Nie żyje Edward Flak, wieloletni burmistrz Olesna, były poseł i jeden z założycieli Mniejszości Niemieckiej ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish lawyers Category:Polish mayors
title: Edward Flak
